bioghist.p: The Presbytery of Lake Superior, after reorganization, is now the Presbytery of Mackinac. Its responsibilities are to the United Presbyterian Churches of northern Michigan.

scopecontent.p: The organizational records include minutes, 1857-1961, roll of presbytery, 1893-1960; treasurer's account book, 1895-1931; histories, 1876 and 1887; correspondence, 1921-1926, concerning Stanton Fund and dissolution of Hessel church; and miscellaneous.
